record.dc:title: 7BT21, 15BT21, Butler County, Kentucky. Annis Sand Mound. Refuse pit with shell.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Mississippian Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: Feature No. 7 is a refuse pit containing some quantity of mussell shell. The outline of the pit became apparent at 1.1' below stake 170 R 4. The depth of the shell lens was close to one foot. One ten pound sack of shell, bone fragments, and flint was saved, without assignment of a field specimen number. This was the only good refuse pit on BT WL. View from north.
